member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Resets the Time to 1 and starts the Animation.

member.summary: Resumes the animation if it was stopped before finishing.

member.summary: Ends the currently running animation.

member.summary: Called each step in the Animation.

member.summary: Called when the animation has reached its end.

member.summary: Fired when the animation has reached the end.

member.summary: An Enum that describes the type of width for the Column.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.ColumnWidthType.Auto
member.summary: A column's width will size to the largest header or cell in the column. Note: while scrolling the width of the column may grow as larger content comes into view, however, it will never decrease in width.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.ColumnWidthType.InitialAuto
member.summary: A column's width will size to the largest header or cell in the column. However, this will only occur when the grid first loads. Or when a user double clicks on the edge of a column header to resize.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.ColumnWidthType.SizeToHeader
member.summary: A column's width will size to the header of a column.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.ColumnWidthType.SizeToCells
member.summary: A column's width will size to the largest cell in the column. Note: while scrolling the width of the column may grow as larger content comes into view, however, it will never decrease in width.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.ColumnWidthType.Star
member.summary: A column's width will size to fill any remaing space in the . If more than one column has a star value specified, the remaing width will be split evenly amongst the columns. If other columns already are taking up the majority of the space, the column's width will be zero. If the 's width is Infinity, then the column will act as ColumnWidthType.Auto width.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.ColumnWidthType.Numeric
member.summary: A column's width will size to the value specified.

FixColumnMoved - A fixed column has been moved, the and are in reference to the FixedColumns collection.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.Primitives.CellControlBase.KeepContentInLogicalTree
member.summary: Determines if the Content of the CellControlBase should be allowed to be made to be a logical child of the element.

remarks.p: By default, the Content of a ContentControl is made to be a logical child of the ContentControl. By default the CellControlBase overrides this and prevents the Content from being made a logical child so that inherited properties will follow the visual tree and therefore properties like Foreground can be manipulated within the ControlTemplate (e.g. using VSM). However this property may be set to true prior to any CellControlBase instances being created (e.g. in a static constructor of the main application) to allow the default behavior of the ContentControl.
